definitions: a person who uses a gun either regularly or on a particular occasion

examples.text: a revolver in a broad range of calibers to meet the needs of every shooter
the shooter fires at a rabbit

shortDefinitions: person who uses gun either regularly or on particular occasion

examples.text: he asks what I have in my carrier bag and I tell him it's a shooter

definitions: a type of video game in which the main objective is to shoot at enemies or other targets
shortDefinitions: video game in which main objective is to shoot at enemies

definitions: a member of a team in games such as basketball whose role is to attempt to score goals

examples.text: the visiting shooter hit excellent form during the second quarter

shortDefinitions: member of team in games such as netball and basketball whose role is to attempt to score goals

definitions: a person who throws a die or dice

examples.text: he requests the shooter to throw the dice against the rail

definitions: a small alcoholic drink, especially of distilled liquor

examples.text: geez, he could use a shooter of whiskey

definitions: a marble used to shoot at other marbles.
shortDefinitions: marble used to shoot at other marbles
